CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The onset of oxidation potentials ( E ox ) of PIDT - EHNT , PIDT - DTNT and PIDT-C12NT referred to ferrocene / ferrocenium ( Fc / Fc + ) were 0.68 , 0.68 , and 0.72 V , respectively with the corresponding calculated HOMO energy levels of -5.48 , -5.48 , and -5.52 eV according to the equation of HOMO = -e(E ox + 4.80 ) ( eV ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PIDT-EHNT    |
| PIDT-DTNT    |
| PIDT-C12NT   |
| Ferrocene    |
| Ferrocenium  |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PIDT-EHNT    |
| PIDT-DTNT    |
| PIDT-C12NT   |
| Ferrocene    |
| Ferrocenium  |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names. The other entities in the paragraph, such as "onset of oxidation potentials", "E ox", "HOMO energy levels", "-5.48 eV", "-5.48 eV", "-5.52 eV", "eV", "HOMO = -e(E ox + 4.80 )", and "eV", do not refer to specific material names.
